synopsis.text: Look no further than RPG Real Estate for a magical home in a world that has been at peace for 15 years after the defeat of the demon king! Kotone, a freshly graduated mage, finds herself working at this very agency, where she and her diverse team of colleagues - the demi-human Fa, the priestess Rufuria, and the soldier Rakira - are dedicated to finding the perfect home for their clients, no matter how particular their needs may be. From necromancers to guild receptionists raising pegasus, Kotone and her team are up for the challenge of helping each and every one find their dream home in this fantastical world. Join them on their adventures as they navigate the ups and downs of the real estate business and bring smiles to the faces of their clients, one home at a time!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
